The server language.

Chinese (Taiwan, China) - zh_tw, tw
English (Global) - en_us, en
Japanese (Japan) - ja_jp, ja
Korean (South Korea) - ko_kr, ko

This API requires "UPLOADER" role and "DO NOT ALLOW" inactivated account to access.

get.summary: Gets a copilot operation by its id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The operation id.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The server language.
List of available languages (case-insensitive):Chinese (Default)EnglishJapaneseKorean

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to query. Default is 1.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The max amount of items in a page. Default is 10.

parameters.name: level_keyword
parameters.description:
The key word to search for. Set this field, the query will run
on all Categories and LevelNames.

parameters.name: operator
parameters.description:
The operator query string. Use `,` to split multiple expressions. All expressions will be combined with AND.
The expression defaults to `Include`, add `~` at the beginning to perform an `Exclude` operation. Eg: `A,~B,C`
will be translate to `Must include A and C, and must exclude B`. The operator query will not be only applied to
the `Operators` field of copilot operation. It will not be applied to the `Groups` field, because this field is
too complex to perform a query on. Be aware that `Exclude` operation is performed before `Include` operation.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content to query.

parameters.name: uploader
parameters.description: The name of the uploader.

parameters.name: uploader_id
parameters.description: The ID of the uploader

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: Desc or Asc. Default is Asc. Set this value to "true" to sort in descending order.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Orders result by a field. Only supports ordering by "views", "hot" and "id" (default).

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The server language.
Options:
Chinese (China Mainland) - zh_cn, cn
Chinese (Taiwan, China) - zh_tw, tw
English (Global) - en_us, en
Japanese (Japan) - ja_jp, ja
Korean (South Korea) - ko_kr, ko
